  • public class StationInfoList
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    CS2334. Modified by: ?????

    Date: 2015-10-19
    Project 3

    This class represents the data for a set of stations.

        public StationInfoList(java.lang.String fileName)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Constructor that loads the station information from the geoinfo file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file that contains all station data.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the specified file cannot be opened
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error reading bytes from the file.

      • loadData

        public void loadData(java.lang.String fileName)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Load the file containing all of the observation data and place the individual days into this station list structure.

        Note that the first line in this file gives us the names of all of the fields contained in the file

        Parameters:
        fileName - File to open
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the specified file is not found
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs in reading bytes from the file

        public DailyData getMaximumStat(java.lang.String stationId,

        Note: the return value may be null

        Parameters:
